item.title: choosing a graphic library for jscript
item.description: Choosing a graphic library for jscript: there are several options: raphael: http://raphaeljs.com/ Light weight and highly compatible crossbrowsers. paper.js: http://paperjs.org/ Looks really powerfull Fabric.js: http://fabricjs.com/ Faster than raphael and supports touch devices. Sample html with fabrik: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <script src="https://rawgit.com/kangax/fabric.js/master/dist/fabric.js"></script> </head> <body> <canvas id="c" width="300" height="300" style="border:1px solid #ccc"></canvas> <script> (function() { var canvas = new fabric.Canvas('c'); })(); </script> </body> </html>
